entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • inheritdoc can't resolve type aliased constructors #70770
  • IntelliSense does not suggest anything when inside a collection expression #70760
  • Possibly fragile code in Binder_Query.cs around manipulations with arguments of a method call #70758
    17.10

Closed

  • Excessive permissions on /tmp/VBCSCompiler #61900
    17.6
  • System.BadImageFormatException: Could not load file or assemby 'csc.exe' or one of its dependencies. #70735
  • VerifyOverloadsUpdated integration tests are failing #70511
  • Quick Info tests fail when using new editor package versions #65840

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle satellite assembly loading in .NET Core #70769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Performance]: Cache last PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers result when the result is a namespace #70767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.EnsureTypeParametersAreLoaded` #70766
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Keep the solution pinned (on host and OOP) when making multiple calls between systems. #70765
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable IntelliSense for collection expressions #70763
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Create params arrays during binding #70762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break some binding cycles #70759
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix VB intellisense integration test #70756
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Disabling roll forward #70768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix contract assertion firing with SG OOP syncing. (main) #70764
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove conflicting key binding for integration tests #70523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix contract assertion firing with SG OOP syncing. #70755
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid some first-chance exceptions by returning instead #70695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove the old integration test projects #70716
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Link to topic about choosing diagnostic IDs #70700
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
